ThingDef.label: felvine plant
ThingDef.description: A small flowering plant, often found growing in Felyne and Melynx villages. While for most races it's simply a beautiful looking flower, for cat-like Lynians the scent of the flowers is simply divine, and slightly intoxicating.\n\nFelvine flowers can be prepared into powder at the crafting spot. While felvine flowers make a user feel relaxed, felvine powder has the opposite effect, putting one into a battle frenzy, but causing them to become fatigued quickly.
